title: vidheyan
description: Vidheyan (English: The Servile, Malayalam: Ã Â´ÂµÃ Â´Â¿Ã Â´Â§Ã Âµâ€¡Ã Â´Â¯Ã Â´Â¨Ã Âµï¿½Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½) is a 1993 Indian Malayalam film directed and co-written by Adoor Gopalakrishnan. It is a cinematic adaptation of the novel Bhaskara Pattelarum Ente Jeevithavum by Malayalam writer Paul Zacharia. The film explores the master-slave dialectic in a South Karnataka setting. Mammootty plays the lead role in the film, who received several accolades for his work.
